abilities.name: Dowsing Code
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Porygon-Z from your hand onto your Bench, you may search your discard pile for up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards, show them to your opponent, and shuffle them into your deck.

attacks.name: Ambush
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage.
